Text: what type of format is this in.I have been looking for this HBO special forever and I cant get it to play.Ant advice on how to play it would be apriciated
This should be in MPEG format. I use VLC Media player to open it. Hope you enjoy!
I can't understand why some uploaders insist on uploading a file that nothing recognizes...........I appreciate the upload and applaud the effort but why not do it a form that most players recognize
if you put the file in an empty folder it will open with Jet audio or playitall media player. thank you anonymous
if you put the file in an empty folder you can then open it [play] with either jet audio or playitall media player; thank you anonymous for the upload
